short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover apps & themes effortlessly with Shopify App Detector Chrome extension. Streamline your e-commerce research!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you curious about which Shopify apps are being used by your favorite online stores? Or perhaps you want to know the theme they've chosen for their e-commerce site? App Detector for Shopify Chrome extension This handy Chrome extension is your go-to solution for unveiling the apps and themes powering Shopify stores.   

 

How to Use?  

>> Install the Extension   
>> Navigate to any Shopify store that piques your interest 
>> Click the Extension Icon: Click on the extension icon in your Chrome toolbar to activate it 
>> The extension will quickly analyze the Shopify store, revealing the apps it's using 

  

Key Features 

>> Instantly discover the Shopify apps in use by the store you're browsing. 
>> Find out which theme is shaping the store's unique look and feel. 
>> Keep an eye on the e-commerce landscape, identify popular tools, and gain inspiration for your online store. 
>> No need to dig through source code or manually search for apps and themes; it's all at your fingertips.
